item.description: We will be joined by Ed Spath, MD, a cardiologist and group leader of a Course in Miracles group in West Hartford for over 10 years to talk about an area of special interest for him, Near Death Experiences.  The group will start at 3:00, as usual.  When we are done talking, we will have a potluck.  Jeff and Theresa will provide grilled chicken and porto bella mushrooms for the main course.  Please bring a small side dish or dessert to share.  If you remember, try to e-mail me with what you will bring.  Not everyone needs to bring something so if doesn't work for you then just bring yourself.  I'm sure that we will have plenty.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Special Mtg and Potluck
